name:
SAMURAI WARRIORS:
Chronicles 3 Update Ver. 1.0.2
description: This is an update for the SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3 game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
